page.title: 11The University of Buckingham
page.content: This independant university opened in 1976 with 65 students. In March 1983 they recieved a {Royal Charter. }Now there are 500 students, by 1990 there will probably be 700. 38% of them are English, the largest foreign group is from Malay 18%, government sponsored policemen studying law. They offer Business Studies, Law, Economics,Europian Studies,History and Politics, English Literature, Biology and Society.{Computer Studies}is being added. A course lasts two yrs, 4 terms in a year which starts in January. Everyone has to learn a {second {language}from German,Spanish, Japanese or French. Foreign students take an English test before being accepted. The University is on{two sites,}Hunter St and the Franciscan Building. First year students live on the university accomodation.
